newsitem.title: USA: Micro Warehouse Inc Q4 net, share fall.
newsitem.headline: Micro Warehouse Inc Q4 net, share fall.

text.p: (All data above 000s except per share numbers)

NOTES: The 1995 Q4 includes a $4,123 after-tax charge to reflect the restatement for previously announced accounting errors. It also has been adjusted to reflect the January 1996 acqustion of Inmac as a pooling of interests and certain reclassifications to conform to the current period.
1996 year includes $1,875 after tax charge for restatement of previously announced accounting errors in Q1.

1995 year includes $14,027 after tax charge for restatement of previously announced accounting errors, and also to reflect Inmac acquisition, a $1,758 tax benefit for eliminating valuation allowance for net operating losses generated by Inmac and certain reclassifications to conform to the current period.
